page.title: 05Footpath R95
page.content:
The footpath from Hunts Lane, Desford to Newbold Verdon is unique. It is the only public right of way to or from Desford which does not cross a water-course or traverse a significant gradient.
It leaves the highway along the drive to Lockey Farm, rather than the route shown on the O.S. map. ( A diversion was made some years ago. )
It enters Peckleton Parish quite close to Desford before entering Newbold Verdon Parish close to Cottage Farm ( Wibberley's ) on Kirkby Lane.
It enters Newbold Verdon village through metalled paths on a housing estate again not marked on O.S. maps.
